name: qt-virt-manager
tagline: qt virtual machine manager libvirt spice lxc kvm qemu
body:
![Qt Virt-manager icon](https://github.com/F1ash/qt-virt-manager/blob/0.22.43/src/icons/256x256/apps/virtual-engineering.png)

qt-virt-manager
=================

A GUI application for managing virtual machines.

![Made with libvirt](http://libvirt.org/madeWith.png)
Uses [libvirt](http://libvirt.org/index.html) as the back-end management API.

Uses [Spice client viewer](http://www.spice-space.org) for graphic consoles
to guest domains.
